summary: Enhance the UI by applying the exact visual styling and animations from the Tactics tab across all tabs to improve overall visual appeal.
architectural_notes: Use the Tactics tab as the baseline design/animation pattern to be replicated across all other tabs for consistent look and feel.

existing_features.title: Update the BASICS, MEDICAL, INFO, UTILITIES, WEAPONS, and SETTINGS tabs to use the same visual styling as the TACTICAL tab by reusing the existing Tactical tab CSS patterns (e.g., `.tactical-panel`, bordered/inset-glow panel look, textured panel background, and dense HUD typography) for their primary panels and sections.

Apply the same interaction polish used in the Tactical tab (hover states, subtle transitions, and emphasis effects such as glow/pulse where appropriate) to comparable interactive elements in all other tabs (e.g., list rows, toggles, buttons, and panel sub-rows) while preserving existing functionality.

Standardize tab content layout spacing and scrolling so that all tabs follow the Tactical tab content container conventions (padding scaled by `--hud-scale`, consistent internal gaps, and predictable overflow behavior) across STANDARD and TACTICAL display modes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply the exact Tactics-tab visual style and animations to all tabs to make the UI more visually appealing.

projectName: Apply Tactical tab visual styling and animations across all tabs
